mapper.select: SELECT r.star_rating starRating , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM booking bb INNER JOIN review rr ON bb.booking_no = rr.booking_no where bb.booking_company_id = #{companyId} AND r.star_rating = rr.star_rating) cnt FROM review r GROUP BY r.star_rating DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) totalCnt , AVG(r.star_rating) totalAvg FROM booking b INNER JOIN review r ON b.booking_no = r.booking_no where b.booking_company_id = #{companyId}

SELECT AVG(r.star_rating) star , COUNT(r.star_rating) cnt , bp.booking_product_name productName FROM booking b INNER JOIN booking_product bp ON b.product_no = bp.booking_product_no INNER JOIN review r ON r.booking_no = b.booking_no WHERE b.booking_company_id = #{companyId} GROUP BY bp.booking_product_name ORDER BY star DESC, cnt DESC LIMIT 0, 5
